resources.string: He born in Rajshahi on January 3, 1984. He gained his masters degree in Sociology from Rajshahi College. From his early school life he was attached to politics. He is a Bangladeshi Politician from the Bangladesh Awami League and former President of Bangladesh Student Leauge at Rajshahi Mohanagar Branch. He is a honorable member of Awami Family since last 8 years.
